name: Unfinished Mini Game Jam 114
description:
GAME IS UNFINISHED! NO EXIT MENU/DAMAGE

Controls: 

WASD - movement

Left Click - shoot

Goal:

Lock enemies in place by hitting them three times with the gun!

___________________________________________

Our goal as developers was to create a game with a dangerous environment (pitfalls, spike traps, swinging axes, etc.). Players were only given a non-damaging freeze gun, so they have no choice but to freeze enemies over traps to inflict damage. Freezing can easily be abused in a 1v1 scenario, so multiple enemies would be spawned in.

The game would progress in a level-style, where there would be a few stages before a boss. A boss would be fought 1v1, possibly spawning more enemies as time goes on.

I wanted to at least program the main mechanic in, and I'm glad we were able to finish that part in time.
